Class MulticoreMandelbrotProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.technical.backend.algorithms.MulticoreMandelbrotProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlgorithmProvider, MandelbrotProvider
public class MulticoreMandelbrotProvider extends Object implements MandelbrotProvider
Multicore implementation of MandelbrotProvider. Uses parallel streams to distribute row computation across CPU cores.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    • compute

      public int[][] compute(double xMin, double xMax, double yMin, double yMax, int width, int height, int maxIterations)
      Description copied from interface: MandelbrotProvider
      Computes Mandelbrot set iterations using primitive doubles. Suitable for standard zoom levels and high performance.
      Specified by:
      compute in interface MandelbrotProvider
      Parameters:
      xMin - minimum real coordinate
      xMax - maximum real coordinate
      yMin - minimum imaginary coordinate
      yMax - maximum imaginary coordinate
      width - image width
      height - image height
      maxIterations - maximum iterations per pixel
      Returns:
      2D integer array [width][height] containing iteration counts
